name: Orca
introduce:
Orca is a Solana-based automated market maker (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX).Orca has a core focus on user interface, bolstering ease of use and accessibility through human-centered design.
As the largest pure AMM on Solana, Orca places special emphasis on the composability and simplicity of the AMM and is set up to be a “DeFi lego” (middleware) for the ecosystem.
